Description:
Coordinator - Prince Turki Center for Creativity and EntrepreneurshipProgram Coordination: Successfully plan, manage, and implement various programs and initiatives offered by the Prince Turki Center, including workshops, conferences, mentoring programs, and startup accelerators.
Collaboration and Partnership: Identify, establish, and maintain partnerships with relevant organizations, institutions, and industry experts to enhance program offerings and drive collaboration in the entrepreneurship and creative sectors.
Outreach and Networking: Actively engage with diverse stakeholders, including entrepreneurs, artists, educators, and government agencies, to promote activities of the Prince Turki Center.
Event Planning and Execution: Organize and oversee events, both on-site and off-site, ensuring seamless logistics, participant registration, marketing, and post-event evaluation.
Administrative Support: Assist in administrative duties to support the effective functioning of the Prince Turki Center.
Data Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of program participants, partners, and stakeholders utilizing effective dashboard.
Communication and Documentation: Prepare and distribute communication materials, including newsletters, reports, and website content, to highlight the achievements and impact of the Prince Turki Center.
Monitoring and Evaluation: Conduct regular assessments and evaluations to measure the effectiveness and impact of the programs, seeking continuous improvement opportunities.Skills
Skills:
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Event Management, or a related field.
Proven experience (1-2 years) in coordinating events, programs, or projects.
Excellent organizational skills
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel
Knowledge of the entrepreneurship and creative sectors in Saudi Arabia is preferred.
Ability to work independently, taking initiative while also being a collaborative team player.
Fluent in Arabic and English, both spoken and written.
